results.code:
356     msg = (
357         "🤖 **Current Configuration**

"
358         "**OpenAI Settings:**
"
359         f"• Model: `{current_model}`
"
360         f"• Temperature: `{current_temp}`
"
361         f"• Max Tokens: `{current_max_tokens}`

"
362         "**Available Commands:**
"
363         "• `/ask` - Run manual promotion scan
"
364         "• `/sources` - List current sources
"
365         "• `/addsrc <url>` - Add new source URL
"
366         "• `/rmsrc <id_or_url>` - Remove source by index or URL
"
367         "• `/update` - AI-powered search for new sources
"
368         "• `/chat <text>` - Talk with integrated AI assistant
"
369         "• `/end` - Clear chat context
"
370         "• `/config` - Show current configuration

"
371         "**AI Configuration:**
"
372         "• `/setmodel <model>` - Change AI model
"
373         "• `/settemp <0.0-2.0>` - Set temperature (0.0-2.0)
"
374         "• `/setmaxtokens <100-4096>` - Set max response tokens

"
375         "**Source Management:**
"
376         "• `/import <urls>` - Import sources from URLs in text
"
377         "• `/export` - Export all sources as text

"
378         "**Scheduling:**
"
379         "• `/schedule` - View current scan/update schedule
"
380         "• `/setscantime <hours>` - Set promotion scan times (e.g., 8,20)
"
381         "• `/setupdatetime <hour>` - Set source update time (e.g., 7)

"
382         "**Advanced:**
"
383         "• `/brain <command>` - Let AI control and optimize the bot
"
384         "• `/debug` - Show bot status and diagnostics

"
385         "**Available Models:**
"
386         "• gpt-4o-mini (fastest, cheapest)
"
387         "• gpt-4o (most capable)
"
388         "• gpt-4-turbo
"
389         "• gpt-3.5-turbo"
390     )
